CustomField.formula: (Mileage__c > 250 || ( Mileage__c > 0 && (Day_Of_Week__c = 'Sunday' || Day_Of_Week__c = 'Saturday')) || Origin_Equal_Destination__c = true || (Mileage__c > 100 && Tracing_Style__c = 'Manual GPS Tracking') || (Mileage__c > 150 && Tracing_Style__c = 'App Manual Entry') || (Mileage__c > 150 && Tracing_Style__c = 'Web Manual Entry') || Time_In_High_Risk__c = true)&&ISPICKVAL( Activity__c ,"Business")
CustomField.label: High Risk Mileage
